text: Nulaaɓe maɓɓe ɓen maaki: "E hara sikke no e fii Alla, fuɗɗuɗo kammuuli ɗin e leydi ndin, himo nodda on fii yo O haforan on yoga e junuubi mon, himo nennana on haa e lajal innaangal?" Ɓe wi'i: "On wonaali si wanaa ɓanndinke yeru amen. Hiɗon faandii nde sakkotoɗon(falotodon) men e kon ko baabiraaɓe amen rewaynoo. Addanee men hujja ɓannguɗo
